analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the test. It is essential to investigate why this page failed and ensure that all critical resources are loaded correctly.
insights: The Pricing Page has the best performance in terms of load time, TTFB, and FCP. It can serve as a benchmark for optimizing the other pages.
The Blog Page has a longer duration than the Pricing Page, but its load time and FCP are acceptable. It is recommended to optimize the Blog Page further to reduce its duration.
The Homepage has a longer load time than the Pricing Page and Blog Page. It is recommended to optimize the Homepage further to reduce the load time.
The "How It Works" page failed the test, and it is essential to investigate why this page failed and ensure that all critical resources are loaded correctly.
